%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW disability_grouped

    AS

Select Disability_text as DisabilityCode, 
        first(Disability_Code_Description) as Description
FROM odw_standardised_db.vw_protected_characteristics 
GROUP BY Disability_Text

# Check for new, updated or deleted data
- This script checks for new, updated or deleted data by checking the source data (sap hr) against the target (odw_harmonised_db.employee_dim)
- **New Data:** where a Disability_Text in the source does not exist as an DisabilityCode in the target. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Updated data:** Comparison occurs on Disability_Text in source and DisabilityCode in target where the row hash is different i.e. there is a change in one of the columns. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Deleted data:** where an DisabilityCode in the target exists but the same Disability_Text doesn't exist in the source. DeletedData flag is set to 'Y'

## View disability_dim_new is created

%%sql
-- Build disability_dim table
-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW disability_dim_new

    AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT DISTINCT
    CASE
        WHEN T1.DisabilityCode IS NULL
        THEN T3.DisabilityID
        ELSE NULL
    END as DisabilityID, 
    T1.DisabilityCode,
    T1.Description,
    T2.SourceSystemID as SourceSystemID,
    to_timestamp(T1.expected_from) AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo,
    md5(CONCAT(IFNULL(T1.DisabilityCode,'.'), IFNULL(T1.Description,'.'))) as RowID,
    'Y' as IsActive,
    T3.IsActive as HistoricIsActive

FROM disability_grouped T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description AND T2.IsActive = 'Y'
FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_disability_dim T3 ON T1.DisabilityCode = T3.DisabilityCode and T3.IsActive = 'Y'
WHERE  

        -- flags new data        
        (   CASE
                WHEN T1.DisabilityCode = T3.DisabilityCode AND 
                        md5(CONCAT(IFNULL(T1.DisabilityCode,'.'), IFNULL(T1.Description,'.'))) <> T3.RowID  
                THEN 'Y'
                WHEN T3.DisabilityCode IS NULL
                THEN 'Y'
            ELSE 'N'
            END  = 'Y' )

# Dataset is created that contains changed data and corresponding target data
- This script combines data that has been updated, Deleted or is new, with corresponding target data
- View **disability_dim_new** is unioned to the target data filter to only those rows where changes have been detected
## View disability_dim_changed_rows is created

%%sql
-- Create new and updated dataset

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW disability_dim_changed_rows

    AS

-- gets updated, deleted and new rows 

Select 
    DisabilityID,
    DisabilityCode,
    Description, 
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
From disability_dim_new WHERE HistoricIsActive = 'Y' or HistoricIsActive IS NULL

    UNION ALL

-- gets original versions of updated rows so we can update EndDate and set IsActive flag to 'N'

SELECT
    DisabilityID,
    DisabilityCode,
    Description,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.hr_disability_dim
WHERE DisabilityCode IN (SELECT DisabilityCode FROM disability_dim_new WHERE DisabilityID IS NULL)
AND IsActive = 'Y';

# View disability_dim_changed_rows is used in a merge (Upsert) statement into the target table
- **WHEN MATCHED** ON the Business Key (i.e. Disability_Text from Personal Characteristics), EndDate is set to today -1 day and the IsActive flag is set to 'N'
- **WHEN NOT MATCHED** ON the business key, insert rows
## Table odw_harmonised.disability_dim is updated

%%sql

-- merge into dim table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.hr_disability_dim AS Target
USING disability_dim_changed_rows AS Source

ON Source.DisabilityID = Target.DisabilityID

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.ValidTo = date_sub(current_timestamp,1),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

-- Insert completely new rows
WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT * ;

# Fix the IDs
- No auto-increment feature is available in delta tables, therefore we need to create new IDs for the inserted rows
- This is done by select the target data and using INSERT OVERWRITE to re-insert the data is a new Row Number
## Table odw_harmonised.disability_dim is updated

%%sql
-- Insert new DisabilityID

INSERT INTO odw_harmonised_db.hr_disability_dim

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY DisabilityCode NULLS LAST) AS DisabilityID, 
    DisabilityCode,
    Description, 
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.disability_dim_changed_rows;
